aim.short: Stand still for +1 die on next ranged attack.
aim.long: Main Action. Cannot Move this activation; gain +1 die on next ranged attack.

backstab.long: Passive. +1 damage if target is already engaged with another friendly model.

brutal_blow.long: Passive. +1 damage on successful melee hit.

blood_in_the_air.long: Passive. Gain +1 die on next attack when any model within 6" is reduced to 0 Quality.

corrode.short: Extra effects vs Mechan or Metal.
corrode.long: Passive. Successful melee vs Mechan = 1 auto-damage. Vs Metal = Remove 1 property OR -1 Defense.

deadeye.short: Reroll all failed dice on a ranged attack.
deadeye.long: Once Per Game. Re-roll all failed dice on a single ranged attack.

furious.long: Passive. If Quality is lost, gain +1 die on next melee attack.

impact.long: Passive. Moving 3"+ into contact deals 1 automatic hit before rolling attack dice.

brutal_impact.long: Passive. Moving 3"+ into contact deals 2 automatic hits before rolling attack dice.

savage_impact.long: Passive. Moving 3"+ into contact deals 3 automatic hits before rolling attack dice.

press_the_advantage.long: Passive. On hit, convert 1 excess Success into +1 damage or +2" Move. Penalty: -1 die on next Action. Q3+ only.

panic_fire.long: Reactive. Once per round. When targeted by melee, make ranged attack at -1 die, then test Morale.

pinning_shot.long: Passive. On hit, target cannot move during its next activation.

blast.long: Passive. 3" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model; Cover applies normally.

massive_blast.long: Passive. 6" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model; Cover applies normally.

relentless.long: Reactive. If enemy is destroyed in melee, immediately move 2".

sonic.long: Passive. Ignores Cover. Affects physical-immune targets. May cause Deafening/Disorientation.

vengeful.long: Passive. Each time Quality is lost, +1 die on next attack. Stacks until the attack is resolved.

hex.long: Passive. On successful hit, target suffers -1 Quality until end of its next activation.

venom.long: Passive. After this unit deals damage in melee, the target suffers 1 additional damage at the end of its next activation unless it is Bloodless or Automat.

flechette_drop.long: Main Action. Once per activation while Flying, place a 6" diameter circle anywhere this unit moved over this activation. All units inside suffer a ranged attack roll. Cover does not apply.

hell_spray.long: Main Action. Three times per game, this unit may unleash a cone attack instead of a normal attack. Place a 12" long, 12" wide cone template from this unit's facing. All units whose bases are partially or fully within the cone are targeted. Roll this unit's Quality as a ranged attack against each target separately.

demolition.long: Passive. Deals double damage to structures and terrain features.

down_the_hatch.long: Passive. Titan. This unit can swallow another unit whole if it exceeds the target's Defense by 4 or more during a melee attack. The swallowed unit must be reasonably sized (no vehicles or other Titans). The swallowed unit is immediately killed and removed from play.

mark_target.long: Main Action. Once per game: Choose one enemy within LoS. That target takes +1 damage from all sources until end of round.

pass_judgment.long: Main Action. Once per game, target one enemy unit within 12". Until end of game, that unit suffers -1 to all Defense rolls and Liberty Corps units may reroll 1s when attacking it.

quick_draw.long: Passive. May attack first in melee if charged.

stagger.long: Passive. On a successful hit, the target loses 1" of movement and rolls -1 die on its next action. If the target is reduced to 0 Move, it may not Disengage this activation.

suppression.long: Passive. On a hit, the target rolls -1 die on its next action (attack, ability, or Morale test).

under_fire.long: Passive. On successful ranged hit: target is Pinned AND suffers -1 Quality until end of its next activation.

universal_terror.long: Passive. When this unit fires its weapon: ALL units (friendly AND enemy) within 12" must test Morale.

choking_dust.long: Passive. If this unit's attack hits but deals no damage, target becomes Suppressed until end of its next activation. On natural 6 to hit, Suppressed extends by one additional activation.
